alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 7:49PM MST until March 05 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph Friday afternoon. * WHERE...Areas near Flagstaff, Williams, Doney Park, Munds Park, Happy Jack, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard. * WHEN...From noon Friday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from noon Friday to 5 AM Saturday: Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 2 to 4 inches Forest Lakes 3 to 5 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Williams 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
